BEToolBarUI
public static class BEToolBarUI.ToolBarBorder
extends javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
implements javax.swing.plaf.UIResource, javax.swing.SwingConstants

工具条边框，左边（或右、或上方）有拖动触点的绘制，方便 告之用户它是可以拖动的 A border for the ToolBar. If the ToolBar is floatable then the handle grip is drawn

1.4
